typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'CloudSales',
	fileName: 'dbo.Addresses.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CloudSalesAddresses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'VanArsdel/dboCustomers',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> VanArsdelAddresses
source(output(
		{_col0_} as string,
		{_col1_} as string,
		{_col2_} as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as string,
		{_col5_} as string,
		{_col6_} as string,
		{_col7_} as integer,
		{_col8_} as long,
		{_col9_} as date,
		{_col10_} as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'FourthCoffe',
	fileName: 'Customers.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> FourthCoffeeAddresses
VanArsdelAddresses derive(SourceId = 2) ~> AddSourceId2
FourthCoffeeAddresses derive(SourceId = 3) ~> AddSourceId3
CloudSalesAddresses derive(SourceId = 1) ~> AddSourceId1
AddSourceId2, AddSourceId3 union(byName: false)~> UnionVAFC
UnionVAFC select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerAddressSelect
CustomerAddressSelect derive(AddressID = concat(toString(SourceId),'_',CustomerID)) ~> AddAddressId
